inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: 1.8 cm infiltrating ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Lumpectomy was done and the surgical margins were clear

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Axillary sampling revealed 1 positive lymph node out of 12 sampled

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: All patients are planned to receive ipsilateral whole breast radiation

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Performance status corresponding to ECOG grade 0-2

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Clinically and sonographically negative axillary lymph nodes before biopsy

exclusion.label: triggers
